document.full_text: the u.s. food and drug administration (fda) said it is reviewing results from two studies that showed there is a higher risk of blood clots in women taking birth control pills containing the compound drospirenone.
document.title: fda to look at blood clot risk from drospirenone
lines_and_colors: the u.s. food and drug administration (fda) said it is reviewing results from two studies that showed there is a higher risk of blood clots in women taking birth control pills containing the compound drospirenone.
